QuestData.Title: Lighting The Darkness
QuestData.Description: The spirits of my ancestors have always been drawn to the mountain of Oshu'gun. Now, I too feel this pull deep within my soul...but something is not right.$b$bThe presence that beckons us has grown dark and ominous. It consumes the souls of the dead, the souls of my ancestors, $n.$b$bSomething must be done.$b$bTake hold of the spirit torch and light the ceremonial pyres in the Ancestral Grounds.$b$bThe flame of the spirit torch upon the pyres will calm the restless spirits being drawn into the void.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Spirit Torch to light the Ceremonial Pyres within the Ancestral Grounds.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you placed the spirit flame upon the pyres, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Now that the flame of the spirit torch is upon the pyres, the spirits of my ancestors have been insulated from the call of the void within Oshu'gun.$b$bHowever, more must still be done if the spirits here are to rest peacefully.
